com.roughike.bottombar

Interface OnMenuTabClickListener


  • public interface OnMenuTabClickListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMenuTabReSelected(int menuItemId)
      The method being called when currently visible BottomBarTab is reselected.
      void onMenuTabSelected(int menuItemId)
      The method being called when currently visible BottomBarTab changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onMenuTabSelected

        void onMenuTabSelected(int menuItemId)
        The method being called when currently visible BottomBarTab changes. This listener is fired for the first time after the items have been set and also after a configuration change, such as when screen orientation changes from portrait to landscape.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - the new visible tab's id that was assigned in the menu xml resource file.

      • onMenuTabReSelected

        void onMenuTabReSelected(int menuItemId)
        The method being called when currently visible BottomBarTab is reselected. Use this method for scrolling to the top of your content, as recommended by the Material Design spec
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - the reselected tab's id that was assigned in the menu xml resource file.
